sql.query: UPDATE scheduled_tasks sta JOIN scheduled_tasks stb ON (stb.class_name='plugins.generic.pln.classes.tasks.Depositor_TEMP') SET sta.last_run = stb.last_run WHERE sta.class_name='plugins.generic.pln.classes.tasks.Depositor'

UPDATE scheduled_tasks sta JOIN scheduled_tasks stb ON (stb.class_name='plugins.generic.pln.classes.tasks.Depositor_TEMP') SET sta.last_run = stb.last_run WHERE sta.class_name='plugins.generic.pln.classes.tasks.Depositor'

UPDATE scheduled_tasks sta SET last_run=stb.last_run FROM scheduled_tasks stb WHERE sta.class_name='plugins.generic.pln.classes.tasks.Depositor' AND stb.class_name='plugins.generic.pln.classes.tasks.Depositor_TEMP'
